Diverting Taunt.name: Diverting Taunt
Diverting Taunt.flavor: Your bewildering and enraging taunts distract your target from far more devastating attacks to come.
Diverting Taunt.effect: The target grants combat advantage for this attack.
Diverting Taunt.onHit: 2[W] + highest ability modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.

Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.name: Silver Tongue, Silver Blade
Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.flavor: Through a combination of careful strikes and witty barbs, you keep your enemy reeling.
Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.onHit: 3[W] + highest ability modifier damage. In addition, you can choose one: the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls or grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you hit the target with an attack, you can choose one: the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls or grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Master Negotiator.name: Master Negotiator
Master Negotiator.flavor: Through careful study of body language, intonations, and other subtle clues, you can tailor your own efforts to your adversary.
Master Negotiator.effect: Choose Bluff or Diplomacy. Once per round until the end of the encounter, you can roll twice when rolling that skill and choose the higher of the two rolls.
